Examples of such continuous processes are the temperatures measured by analogue maximum and minimum thermometers or thermographs, and the rainfall measured by raingauge.

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: NG group widths, each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 37 of data representation template 5.2. Bits set to zero shall be appended as necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on an octet boundary

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: NG scaled group lengths, each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 47 of data representation template 5.2. Bits set to zero shall be appended as necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on an octet boundary

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: Packed values (X2 in the decoding formula), where each value is a deviation from its respective group reference value

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.2 - Grid point data - complex packing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: NG group reference values (X1 in the decoding formula), each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 20 of data representation template 5.0. Bits set to zero shall be appended as necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.3 - Grid point data - complex packing and spatial differencing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: NG group reference values (X1 in the decoding formula), each of which is encoded using the number of bits specified in octet 20 of data representation template 5.0. Bits set to zero shall be appended where necessary to ensure this sequence of numbers ends on an octet boundary

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.3 - Grid point data - complex packing and spatial differencing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: Same as for data representation template 7.2

GRIB2_Template_en.Title_en: Data template 7.3 - Grid point data - complex packing and spatial differencing
GRIB2_Template_en.Contents_en: First value(s) of original (undifferenced) scaled data values, followed by the overall minimum of the differences. The number of values stored is 1 greater than the order of differentiation, and the field width is described at octet 49 of data representation template 5.3
